question: Which of the following Beverages appointed T.K.K. Krishnakumar as the President of India and South West Asia Business Unit?
explanation: Beverages major Coca-Col appointed T.K.K. Krishnakumar as President of its India and South West Asia Business Unit. TKK Krishnakumar, who currently serves as CEO and South West Asia Regional Director of Hindustan Coca-Cola Beverages Pvt Limited. He will take over the position effective May 1.
